original: Melin, Karl’ Ruben Andre^as, ikyriko-heride, SkiuCitioirp, f. 26/8/03 d Diimbo, Skairab. il. G. 36 m. Maj Ekimian. Barn: Tor bio ng f. 37, Kriistiina 39, Hiiilillevfi 45. — Teoill flik ex. 22, teoil. :ka’nd. 28, pirakt. teioil. proiv o. präs’tv. is. å. Rets. i Tyskil. o. Eng^l’. Kapieililfpred. d Vargiön 31, kicim-miin. d Ö^ienäs 39, kyrlkoheride i Sjoger-sitad fr. 45.
translated: Melin, Karl Ruben Andreas, born 26/8/03 in Diimbo, Skairab. Died at an unknown date. Age 36. Married to Maj Ekimian. Children: Tor, born in 1937; Kristiina, born in 1939; Hiiilillevfi, born in 1945. Completed elementary school at age 22, high school at age 28, and vocational school at age 30. Worked as a bookkeeper, clerk, and assistant manager. Worked as a lawyer in Tyskil and England. Was a chaplain in Vargiön in 1931 and a pastor in Ö^ienäs in 1939. Became a church minister in Sjogerstad in 1945.
